person.persName: Lucius B. Desha (Harrison County, Kentucky, politician)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, politician. Mason County, Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Desha and Peggy Bledsoe Desha. Married Juliann Moore on August 9, 1832. Father of Joseph Desha, Ben Desha, and Julia Desha. Married Eliza Moore on June 9, 1840. Father of Ada Desha, Ann Desha, Lucius Desha, Cave Desha, Bettie Desha, Jack Desha, Claude Desha, and Fanny Desha. Served in the state legislature from 1844 to 1861. Delegate to the Democratic Party Nation Conventions in 1844 at Baltimore, Maryland and in 1856 at Cincinnati, Ohio. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850 and 1860. Owned twenty-seven enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1850. Owned thirty-three enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.
